english: Game theory and the operation of franchise system in civil airports
chinese: 机场特许经营权运作的博弈分析

english: Please print or type the information requested in the boxes below
chinese: 需要强调这并非特许经营权申请书。

english: The main contents are as follows : first , franchising and franchising right
chinese: 本文的主要内容如下：一、特许经营与特许经营权。

english: The city granted the company a franchise to operate buses on the city streets
chinese: 市政府给该公司在市内街道营运公车的特许经营权。

english: Before buying a franchise , you should have experience running a small business
chinese: 在购买特许经营权之前，你需要有一些运作小生意的经验。
特许经营权造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Jenny , i am not going to be able to make the meeting with the franchise holders next week
chinese: 詹妮，我下周不能同那些特许经营权者会面了。

english: Chartered chain operation is a franchise transfer at the core of a business
chinese: 摘要特许连锁经营是以特许经营权的转让为核心的一种经营方式。

english: Franchise and licenses are exclusive rights to perform services in certain geographical areas
chinese: 特许经营权及许可证是在一定地域内提供某种服务的独家权力。

english: Don bradley : i have arranged to go to see some of our overseas franchise holders next week
chinese: 堂布拉德利：我已经安排了下周去见见我们海外的特许经营权者。

english: Mainly clarifies the meaning and characteristic of franchising and the nature of franchising right
chinese: 主要阐明特许经营的含义，法律特征以及特许经营权的性质。

english: Tom hit the jackpot when he sold the stock in the fast - food franchise that he bought in 1969
chinese: 汤姆在卖出他于1969年购买的快餐业的特许经营权的股份时，赚了一大笔。

english: It was said that there was another netherlander besides kroc who bought the franchise from mcdonald brothers
chinese: 据说，当年从麦当劳兄弟手里买下特许经营权的除了克罗克，还有一个荷兰人。

english: The cost of a franchise of license is amortized over its useful or legal life , whichever is shorter
chinese: 特许经营权和许可证的成本，也在其使用期或法定有效期（选择其中较短的）内进行摊销。

english: In addition , buying a franchise from an established company , while not guaranteeing success , will at least diminish the risk of failure
chinese: 此外，买下一家已具规模的公司的特许经营权，虽然不保证一定成功，但至少降低了失败的风险。

english: In august 2003 , the group successfully acquired the rights to operate the shanghai section of the shanghai - nanjing highway for 25 years with 2 billion rmb
chinese: 2003年8月，集团以20亿元人民币成功收购沪宁高速公路上海段特许经营权。
